text: Bréau-Mars is a commune in the Gard department in southern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Bréau-et- Salagosse (the seat) and Mars.Arrêté préfectoral 13 September 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Gard department ==References== Category:Communes of Gard Category:Populated places established in 2019
title: Bréau-Mars
